answers.answer: I think you may have diabetes.  Get to the doctor right away to get your blood sugar under control.

question: Recently I've been having these symptoms...1. Gained 20 pounds in 2 weeks..... I only eat once a day and run 2 hours a day yet I suddenly gained all this weight2. Hives.... after running for 1 hour, I get tingly feeling in my hands and feet, then become itchy from head to toe. Only happens when I am soaked in sweat.3. Need to pee about 5 times every night.So do these sound like kidney failure?
title: Am I in the early stages of kidney failure?
